# Who is this book for?

This book is for people who work with data using tools like Excel or Google Sheets but donâ€™t consider themselves computer programmers. Not every analyst needs to become a data scientist or software engineer. Still, nearly all of us can benefit from learning a bit of programming to deepen and extend the kinds of analyses we can do.  

This book is designed as a gentle, accessible starting point.
